definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: She’s also an avid street skateboarder.
sentences.chinese: 她還是一個熱心的街頭滑板愛好者。

sentences.english: Secondly, it should be polite, helpful.
sentences.chinese: 其次，應該禮貌待人，熱心助人。

sentences.english: However, when he is at school, he becomes very warmhearted to those students.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在學校裏他卻對學生非常熱心。

sentences.english: I'm largely a follower of a plant-based diet, of course.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我也是植物性飲食的熱心追隨者。

sentences.english: Jack has been enthusing over the newcome girl recently.
sentences.chinese: 近來，傑克對新來的姑娘表現出熱心。

sentences.english: Indeed he devoted a whole book to discussing the 'soul-life of plants'.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至熱心的寫了一本書探討“植物的精神生活”。

sentences.english: They seem indifferent actually very eager to help with chihiro.
sentences.chinese: 她們表面上冷漠實際上卻無比熱心的幫助着千尋。

sentences.english: More importantly, I have been a warmhearted participant of volunteer activities.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，我還是志願者活動的一個熱心的參與者。

sentences.english: With the help of the enthusiast, I had no difficult finding his home.
sentences.chinese: 在這個熱心人的幫助下，我毫不費力地找到了他的家。

sentences.english: Both are known for their devotion to mentoring, Backus says.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯說，兩人都以熱心輔導學生而著稱。

sentences.english: The zeal of the LORD of hosts will perform this.
sentences.chinese: 萬君之耶和華的熱心，必成就這事。

sentences.english: However, nowadays professional cheats tend to take advantages of kind, helpful and warm-hearted people.
sentences.chinese: 然而，現在職業騙子似乎利用善良和熱心的人。

sentences.english: He is a Re Xinchang who likes to help others.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個熱心腸的人，喜歡幫助別人。

sentences.english: Mary slopped over the wedding arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗對婚禮的準備工作異常熱心。

sentences.english: Swiss people are kind, warm hearted.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士人民很友好和熱心腸。

definition: care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
to show concern and care for
to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
